Comments_List: Overview of the Standard Model and its symmetries, anomalies, chiral anomaly and low energy effective theory, gravity, spinor helicity formalism.

The lectures are really good, though it is on the student to actually work through the material. Problems are given out but not required, which I think is good, because you can focus on what you care about.
Yes, it is taught very well, and you will learn a good deal about the Standard Model and current research pushes beyond the SM.
